channel.title: Compiling Problem

item.title: Compiling Problem
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

if its 100 errors usually somethings in wrong spot, missing bracket, ;, or parenthesis

   if (hitTimer > 0) {

above this

identifier expected i have no idea

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling Problem
item.dc:creator: @Ncarug01 Ncarug01
item.description:
@Ncarug01 wrote:

Hi i just added full pest control got the handler and everything and i need help on it
i get this compiling error and the good thing is its in 1 file
